#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <climits>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int lld;

bool exists(char a[101], char b[][101], int len)
{
    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)
        if(!strcmp(a,b[i]))
            return true;
    return false;        
}

void increment(char a[101], char b[][101], int c, int d[], int len)
{
    for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
    {
        if(!strcmp(a,b[i]))
            d[i]+=c;
    }
}

int main() 
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        char s[100][101],temp,names[15][101]; int score[100],fs[15];
        int k=0,pos=0,large=0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            score[i] = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) 
            { 
                cin.getline(s[i],101,' '); 
                cin>>score[i];
            }
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) 
        {
            if(exists(s[i],names,k))
            {
                increment(s[i],names, score[i],fs,k);
                continue;
            }
            else
            {
                strcpy(names[k],s[i]);
                fs[k] = score[i];
                k++;
            }
        }
        for(int i=0; i<k; i++)
        {
            if(large<fs[i])
            {
                pos = i;
                large = fs[i];
            }
        }
        cout<<names[pos]<<" "<<fs[pos];
    }
	return 0;
}
